Class MouseOverMouseManager

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.graphstream.ui.view.util.MouseManager
public class MouseOverMouseManager
extends org.graphstream.ui.fx_viewer.util.FxMouseManager
Custom MouseManager to manage mouse events on the map.
